metadata.title: CVE-2024-27073 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:ttpci: fix two memleaks in budget_av_attach When saa7146_register_deviceand saa7146_vv_init fails, budget_av_attach should free the resources itallocates, like the error-handling of ttpci_budget_init does. Besides,there are two fixme comment refers to such deallocations.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
